primary.context: The caller wants to get rid of their timeshare property.
primary.detail: The caller wanted to sell their ownership, which is out of scope; the AI attempted a transfer, but no agents were available after a 25-minute wait.

steps: AI identified the intent as selling timeshare ownership.
AI attempted to clarify if the caller meant renting or selling.
AI initiated a transfer to the concierge department.
Caller waited in a queue for approximately 25 minutes.
AI informed the caller that no representatives were available and offered to help again.
Caller expressed frustration that the AI could not help and ended the call.

failure.detail: The AI entered a repetitive clarification loop about renting vs selling after the user had already specified 'ownership entirely'.

clarifications.note: AI clarifying rent vs sell ownership
AI asked about renting after user said ownership

corrections.note: User clarified they want to sell ownership entirely
User corrected AI that they do not want to rent

loops.subject: selling vs renting
loops.note: AI repeatedly asked for clarification on selling intent

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge failed due to no availability

insights.summary: The caller wanted to sell their timeshare ownership, which is out of scope. After a long clarification loop and a 25-minute hold time with no available agents, the caller abandoned the call.
insights.verbatim: Instead of ownership entirely... You just saw it out right.
insights.coaching: The AI should have recognized 'ownership entirely' as a request to sell/surrender and transferred immediately rather than looping on rental questions.
